import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './post-card.css'; const PostsCard = ({ tour }) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews } = tour return (
Featured Post
{ city } { avgRating } ({ reviews })
) } export default PostsCard
